titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to establish the position of Assistant Secretary of Defense for Space, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to establish the position of Assistant Secretary of Defense for Space, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill establishes the position of Assistant Secretary of Defense for Space.
